metadata.name: The Mermaid #10
metadata.description:
"You seemed like a bomb to me,
Tearing up the sky over Hiroshima
You seemed painfully familiar
And not like anyone else.
It was so scary,
And at the same time insanely beautiful.
We can't be together,
And we can't do it without each other either.

I'm breaking up my trains.
I don't care anymore.
I want to believe,
That your soul is the same as mine.
Don't open your eyes.

We will never die,
We are no more."

Lyrics from the song "Trains" by RSAC

3000x3000px
